name: Flight Of Icarus
description:
One button game made during Ludum Dare #36 game jam in 48 hours.
  • Clik to fly up
  • Each time you fly up you loose one feather
  • Don't fly close to sun
  • Don't loose all feathers
  • Catch birds to replace feathers

Made using Unreal Engine.

Team:

Dariusz Ruta - programming, design, art
